Padded Dog Vest Harness: Adjustable dog harness features breathable mesh fabric, strong velcro closure, buckle strap and heavy-duty metal rings for easy and safe dog leash attachment
Fits Most Breeds: This dog walking harness medium was designed to fit most medium breeds of dogs. Please refer to our sizing chart and choose a larger size if your dog is between sizes. Medium: fits 16 – 17 in chest, 11 – 12 in neck.
3 Security Measures: The velcro straps allow you to wrap the harness snug without catching his fur. The buckle secures and provides quick-release, while double rings ensure leash safety at all times
Pet Supplies for Furry Friends: We are pet owners first and business owners second, making our own products and standing behind them

From the brand

Auto Parts

Auto Parts

Accessories For Harley

Alpha Rider began designing and manufacturing Motorcycle Parts with an innovative flair in 2010.

We‘ve since grown to become one of the largest providers of Motorcycle accessories .

We ask ourselves: What would you like to do with your Motorcycle… that enhances your life?

Our approach has given birth to some of the best known accessories .

Auto Parts

Auto Parts

【Wide Application】Perfectly fit all types of vehicles. This ground strap is a good parner that connects an engine block to a framework. The rated current of this engine ground strap is 62 Amps.
【High-quality Copper Materials】 This ground strap is made of copper with a tin-plated surface to provide superior current delivery, resistance to oxidation and corrosion, as well as a long service life.
【Practical Structure】 These braided ground straps is 1/2″ wide, which provide durability, flexibility and maximum conductivity.The 5/16″ Rings Terminal makes installation a breeze.
【Package Included】3pcs 10″x 1/2″ & 2pcs 13″ x 1/2″ Professional Vehicle Grounding Cable Straps are included.Each strap is built from center to center of lugs holes.
【Great Service Support】 If you encounter any problems in the process of purchasing and using this product, please feel free to contact us. We will solve the problem for you in the first time and provide you with the best after-sales service.

Product Description

Ergonomic Design

Designed according to body curve, provides great support for your back and lumbar. Daily usage may help to correct your sitting posture. And prevent back pain caused by unhealthy posture.

Premium Memory Foam

Made of high-density shaped memory foam, which never flattens and slowly rebounds itself. Perfect softness combines for comfort and health.

Breathable Mesh Cover

The ventilative mesh promotes air circulation to keep the lumbar pillow cool and comfortable. Suitable for all seasons. The cover is removable and machine washable to keep the pillow clean.

【Premium Memory Foam】The high density, premium, molded responsive memory foam combines soft and support. Elastic foam material can adjust to your body contour to make up the support your chair lacks. Pillow will never flatten out.
【Ergonomic Design】This lumbar pillow is designed to fit the curve of the waist, which provides different supports for upper, middle and lower back. Effective relief of your back pain and keeps healthy sitting posture.
【Breathable Cover】The mesh cover promotes air circulation to avoid heat accumulation and skin problems caused by long periods of sitting. Additionally, the cover is removable, machine washable and easy to clean.
【Adjustable Straps】LumbarPal lumbar pillow has two extension & adjustable straps, suitable for most kinds of chair such as office chair, gaming chair, wheelchair, car, truck, couch, desk. The great extension straps ensure the pillow can stay where it belongs and will not shift.
【Ideal Gift】A warm and practical gift for your loved ones who often sit and work for long periods. Effective relief for fatigue and back pain. Ideal for drivers, teachers, students, office workers, etc.

Product Description

Comfort Your Life without Pain

Qutool works on providing premium memory foam products, which makes your life healthy. All our products come with 5-years ensure and lifetimes support with 60days unconditional free return.

Memory Foam Lumbar Support Pillow

Ergonomic Designed for Back Pain Relief and Correct Posture

Why do you need a lumbar support pillow?

If you suffer from poor posture with an accentuated curve and chronic back pain, Qutool lumbar cushion is definitely recommended, especially if your routine involves extensive periods of sitting. Qutool Back Cushion helps prevent this by providing support to maintain the muscles and helping maintain proper posture, a lumbar cushion lowers the stress build-up.

Product Name: Lumbar Support Back Cushion Size: 17.32 * 16.14 * 5.11 inches Material: 100% Memory Foam Color: Black, Weight: 1.3 LB Strap：With Extra 11 inches Extension strap Package Included: 1 Back cushion*1 instruction for Use

ORTHOPEDIC DOCTOR RECOMMENDED

It can relieve pressure, automatically shape according to the curve of the human body, and has full support force when fitted, achieving a natural and comfortable stress-free state.

100% PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM

Qutool back cushion adopt thick, high density memory foam that can keep its shape, feel soft and comfortable and made without harmful substances.

3D Ventilated Mesh Washable Cover

The breathable cover can keep air flowing to get your back cool & dry all day long while sitting or driving.

The cover is removable, and easy to keep clean as this durable cover comes with an invisible zipper.

Suitable for all kinds of occasions

At Travel

In office

At Home

At Wheelchair

Material
Premium Memory Foam Premium Memory Foam Premium Gel Shredded Memory Foam Bamboo Terry

Can Help With
Pain Relief Cushion for Hemorrhoid, Pregnancy, Coccyx, Bed Sores, Back, Sciatica relieve pains from Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches and Sores Adjust the height of the memory foam pillow to provide support for the neck, shoulders, back, and head back, and head Hypoallergenic and 100% waterproof to protect your mattress against perspiration, urine and fluids

Scenario
Office Chair, Computer Chair,Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair Office Chair, Computer Chair,Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair Perfect for back, side, and stomach sleeping positions bed room, kids room, guest room, dormitory, hotel room

[UPGRADE & UNIQUE BACK SUPPORT PILLOW]- If you spend a lot of time sitting on office chair, gaming chair and driving in car, this lumbar pillow will perfectly help you. The back support for car is designed ergonomically to relieve upper, mid and lower back pain and back tightness,supports you in achieving right posture and helps maintain a gentle curve in the spine.
[NEVER FLATTENS OUT] – Qutool lumbar support pillow for car adopts High density, thick, durable fabulous and precisely molded memory foam which insures a firm comfy fit and enhance your comfort while retaining its density. The chair pillow can provide enough supportive and more comfortable than lumbar roll or mesh back support, and can also be used as maternity pillow or as back pillow wedge during pregnancy. Ideal for drivers, teachers, students, people in a wheelchair, office workers, and elder etc.
[HOLD in PLACE] – Unlike other low quality office chair pillows on the market, the new Qutool lumbar pillow has two adjustable, upgraded straps, so no matter how you move, the back cushion will stay firmly attached to any office chair, computer chair, sofa, car seat, SUV, truck, wheelchair, recliner and bigger chairs or other home office accessories. Lumbar support pillow size: 18”(longest) x 15.5”(widest) x 4.7”(thickest)
[BREATHABLE 3D MESH COVER]- With removable and machine washable mesh cover, this wheelchair back cushion can keep air circulation well and always keep you back cool and comfortable, dry for the best experience, so sweat and moisture doesn’t fill it up, suitable for all seasons.
[PERFECT GIFT FOR FESTIVAL]- Perfect for christmas,New years, birthdays, valentine’s day, mother’s day, father’s day, weddings, hallows’ day and graduations.Try it now, don’t worry. Please let us know if our lumbar pillow does not work for you for any reason.
Qutool Lumbar Support Pillow comes with a Replacement Policy. Ask for a refund or replacement if you have any quality related issues (covers, zippers, straps, etc.) or other questions, please contact us via Amazon.

Product Description

Drive Auto’s Ultimate Trunk Organizer

Keeping your car clean has never been easier with Drive Auto’s Ultimate Trunk Organizers. Our heavy duty organizer is the easiest, most convenient way to de-junk your car. This versatile, collapsible organizer is engineered to keeps items from rolling around in your trunk. With first-of-its-kind steel tipped tie-down straps that latch almost anywhere, it fits securely in your vehicle anywhere you need it.

KEEP YOUR CAR TIDY AND ORGANIZED

COLLAPSIBLE – Car organization is now easy to come by with the Drive Auto car trunk organizer. It can be resized to fit large or small vehicle spaces and conveniently folds away when not in use.
SECURE – Skip the loose clutter. This car storage organizer features our Tie-Down Strap System to keep belongings in place while on the road. Just fasten to the backseat or anchor points in the trunk.
CAPACITY – Each SUV & truck organizer makes tidying the interior of your car effortless. The storage trunk has multiple compartments to hold groceries, tools, cables, work materials, and other items.
DURABLE – If you’re looking for car organizers and storage space that stay upright for the ride, our truck bed organizer comes reinforced with a waterproof lining and stiff base plates in every panel.
SATISFACTION – Whether you purchase these car and truck accessories as a gift or for yourself, our team is available 24/7 to answer questions or concerns about your trunk organizer for car storage.
